featuredArticle.title: AI Tutors Transform Education: 40% of US Students Now Use Personalized AI Learning
featuredArticle.excerpt: A groundbreaking study reveals that 40% of American students now use AI-powered tutoring systems. Schools report significant improvements in test scores and engagement, particularly among underserved communities with limited access to traditional tutoring.

rightArticles.title: Live: Biden Announces $50 Billion Student Loan Forgiveness Expansion
College Enrollment Rebounds to Pre-Pandemic Levels for First Time
